conbody.p: HDFS File Metadata executorevent source stagesUse the HDFS File Metadata executor in the event handling branch of a pipeline. The HDFS File Metadata executor is meant to update file metadata for output files written to local and HDFS directories.

Use the HDFS File Metadata executor change output file metadata for files written by the following stages:
Hadoop FS destination
Local FS destination
MapR FS destination
HDFS File Metadata does not process events generated when destinations complete streaming whole files. For information on setting permissions for completed whole files, see .
